item.title: The Man in the Cask
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Vincent Starrett)
item.description: He wanted to die in Oak Grove, Illinois. A hell of a place to die, but thatâ€™s what he wanted. The least we can do is see that he gets there right side up.
